about_the_game:
Episode 2 for Games&Girls. Episode 1 is required!

Story:
After the good end of Episode 1 the Protagonist and Sirrah are a couple and living together peacefully. But with no consoles left the protgonist decides to buy a handheld for gaming again. The next day another strange girl appears in his room and she is a little girl!?

Features:
-Anime art
-2 different endings
-HD Resolution
-Adult Content
-Steam Achievements
detailed_description:
Episode 2 for Games&Girls. Episode 1 is required!

Story:
After the good end of Episode 1 the Protagonist and Sirrah are a couple and living together peacefully. But with no consoles left the protgonist decides to buy a handheld for gaming again. The next day another strange girl appears in his room and she is a little girl!?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86/x86_64
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card

name: Games&Girls Episode 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP or later
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Episode 2 of Games&Girls. Plays after the good end of Episode 1 with a new Heroine.
